text.div:
Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes

Example value set for Condition (Problem/Diagnosis) Categories

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/condition-category

CodeDisplayDefinition
complaintComplaintThe patient considers the condition an issue to be addressed
symptomSymptomA symptom of a condition (as might be mentioned in a review of systems)
findingFindingAn observation made by a healthcare provider
diagnosisDiagnosisThis is a judgment made by a healthcare provider that the patient has a particular disease or condition

name: Condition/Problem/Diagnosis Codes
description: Example value set for Condition (Problem/Diagnosis) Categories

concept.definition: The patient considers the condition an issue to be addressed
A symptom of a condition (as might be mentioned in a review of systems)
An observation made by a healthcare provider
This is a judgment made by a healthcare provider that the patient has a particular disease or condition
